articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Shakeout in Indian small-caps seen luring dip buyers to market - The Economic Times
articles.description: Perceived as key beneficiaries of the South Asian nations 8%-plus economic growth, shares of smaller firms are seen staging a comeback after a selloff thats pushed down the Nifty Smallcap 250 Index almost 10% since Feb. 27.
articles.content: This months meltdown in Indias smaller stocks is being termed as a buying opportunity by some investors despite the securities regulators warnings of a potential bubble.Perceived as key beneficiaries… [+3185 chars]
